channel.title: W3C Web Authentication Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Authentication Working Group

item.title: [webauthn-3] PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions.attestation: missing enum value "enterprise"
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions/attestation

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

Specific section or headline?

Section Value defines three possible values:

  • "none":
  • "indirect"
  • "direct"

According to WebAuthn level3 & level 2 the possible values of publicKeyCredentialCreationOptions.attestation are defined by the enum AttestationConveyancePreference:

This member is intended for use by Relying Parties that wish to express their preference for attestation conveyance. Its values SHOULD be members of AttestationConveyancePreference

See https://w3c.github.io/webauthn/#dom-publickeycredentialcreationoptions-attestation and https://www.w3.org/TR/2021/REC-webauthn-2-20210408//#dom-publickeycredentialcreationoptions-attestation

And AttestationConveyancePreference is defined as:

enum AttestationConveyancePreference {
    "none",
    "indirect",
    "direct",
    "enterprise"
};

What did you expect to see?

The value "enterprise" is missing.

MDN Content page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/publickeycredentialcreationoptions/attestation
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions/attestation
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/publickeycredentialcreationoptions/attestation/index.html
  • Last commit: 3b550e1
  • Document last modified: 2021-06-15T14:47:47.000Z
